values:
So Friday was my last day at Boocoo.  I had saturday off.  I havent had a saturday off in a long time.  So Im hanging out in DTRO with Kat and we decide to eat at Quiznos for dinner, I have a Club w/bacon, Then we go bowling.  Half way through the second game Im not feeling so hot.  We finish up our three games then go back to my apt.  I then proceed to have the most violent regurgitation process I have ever witnessed.  I then decide Im going to try to Sleep while Kat watches TV.  She then visits the bathroom and does the same thing I did.  Now its about 5:00 am,  Neither of us can even hold water down and Kats Mom suggest we visit the good old ER.  Half hour later Kat and I and next to each other on Saline drips till 9:00 am.  Could you ask for a better day off, I think not.  

In case you are wondering I did report it to the Oakland County Health Dept.

How goes everybody who reads this?
Myself, I am doing great.  I got meself a new job.  I will now be cooking over at 220 in Birmingham.  I get a wonderful 3 dollar raise (with opportunities for more), health insurance, 401K, and opportunity for paid vacation.  It will be nice because, if anyone keeps up with the Metro Detroit restaurant industry which I doubt you do, The wonderful Chef Shawn Mac was fired and replaced the a money making chef.  This guy is a huge shoe maker.  I may know more about culinary art then he does.  Anyways I would not recommend eating a Boocoo anymore because his menu sucks, might as well just go to Olive Garden.  

MMM... rant that most people wont understand.

I still have not been out skiing yet this season but if anyone wants to (ie Ben) give me a ring so we can.
Other than that all is good in the R.O. ,or actually Troy, front.

Hope you enjoyed this, now its time for some counterstrike.

Haven't updated in a while, I think I am due.  
Well i am 98% settled in to the apt now.  The only thing left is 2 people to move out so I get my storage space for all my other crap that I don't use on a regular basis.
I have been without the internet for a few days now due to billing switches and having to buy a router but now it is back (obviously) and stronger than ever,  hell yeah 802.11g.

If anyone remembers or even reads this I wrote a bit ago that shit may be going down at work. Aka people leaving or being fired.  Well it has begun.  One sous chef has been fired over an argument about a ramekin.  I really not sure how that happened.  Also our  pastry chef gave his 2 weeks  and rumors are that all 3 front of house managers are leaving in one fashion or another.  Any ways I am metaphorically grabbing the bull by the horns ("but that really did happen") and am going after the sous chef position.  Being a sous chef at the restaurant of the year at age 20 would look damn good on a resume.

If the sous chef thing falls through than I am learning how to be a bartender.  I am working on getting my certification now. Fun stuff happening in Chris land.  Its going to be a rough few months.

So I am almost all moved in to an apartment.  I at least have all the essentials unpacked. 
I went grocery shopping to get all the staples of a kitchen and it cost me $95.  Now to start on my very tight budget.

Well anyways give me a call and you can come and see the place for whoever is interested.  I will get some pics as soon as I unpack my webcam.

So exciting stuff, I am moving out of my parents house.  After living here for 20 years I am ready to go (having never left for college).  The aprtment is in Troy off of Rochester Rd and 16 mile.  2 bed 1 bath.  It has a balcony too.  The guy living there already is awsome, he is just like me.  Wow that sounded pompous but what I meant was he has the same interests.  Anyways I move in 2 weeks so as to give the people who are "mooching" time to move out.  Well time to start packing up all my shit which may just take me 2 weeks.

Wow do I feel left out.  Everyone has these long lj updates about going back to school and the hassles of moving and I just go to work.  Things a starting to get a bit wierd.  

In other news I went to the ER yesterday.  I decided it wold be fun at work to spill 500 degree rendered duck fat on my index finger.  Boy was I wrong, It wasent fun at all.  As it turns out I have first degree over most of my finger, a patch of second degree over the second nuckle, and in the center of that a bit of 3rd degree.  Yay lack of feeling in part of my finger.  So my finger in semi swollen and hard to use and i need to find out how to file for workmens comp.

On a lighter note I gauged my ears to a 10.

went to the curiosa festival today.  It was freeking awsome.  Mogwai was great, Muse kicked my ass, interpool weas good and the Cure was not to shaby either.  All in all a great day.  Although we were very close to Muse when they played so I now have the usual after concert ringing in my ears.  

In other news My idustrial (upper ear double piercing) got the thumbs up 100% healed.  I was able to take it out to clean it.  YAY :D

How goes the live jounal,

Im really tired but for some dumb reason im not in bed.  
We have a health inspection at work tommorow and a had to clean the entire back kitchen with a toothbush.  Mind you that is an exageration but the back kitchen is about 3/4 of the whole kitchen including coolers, freezer, dry storage, equiptment storage, tables, sinks, tilt kettles, and varios other large equiptment.

I have the day off tommorow so I can go to the Curiosa festival.  Yay Muse.  That is going to rock.

Lets see,  My lip is now sore and swollen again because I put in new and totaly different jewlery.  Its a j bar, pretty self explanitory,  but it is completly changing the shape of the piercing.  Other than the swelling it looks damn cool.

Doom 3 still rocks my world and scares the crap out of me at night.

well im off to read the 4th harry potter and ice my lip in hopes the swelling and sorness will go away.

so I woke up early today (9:30 am, yes thats early for me)so that I could pick up Doom 3.  Had it installed by 10:30 finally got it working right at about 12:30 am (stupid video drivers).  

Anyways I just played for about 2 hours and that is one scary game.  No lights on but my computer screen, Deamons screaming and moaning in 5.1 surround sound, and im alone.  

Before anyone says it, yeah im a dork but Im a dork that has been looking forward to this game for over a year.  Now to add to the dorkiness im going to go read harry potter.

today was one of the most boring days ever.

woke up at 11:00am played video games
12:00 read harry potter
1:00 took a shower to kill time
1:30 went to B-ham checked out farmers market and sat at java hutt.
4:30 watched 4 episodes of cowboy bebop and putzed around
9:00 WHAT! somones home.  Play cards at bens the excitement of my day.
12:30 update lj

cards should not be the most exciting part of your day
my industrial pic as I promised

Not a whole lot has changed here but lets start with my favorite subject, work.

Well I thought I was going to get more hours and harder work but I was sadly mistaken.  I do have harder work.  They have me coming in on wednesdays which is when our fish comes in.  Yay fish butchery.  They still only have me on 4 days a week.  You need 5 or 35 hours for insurance.  I shake my fist at you Boocoo.

Today I went with Kat to get her Tattoo or Tattoos.  They look awesome.  I am envious so I am getting an industrial tomorrow.  (I have wanted it before, I was just inspired to get it done now).  Ill try to remember to post picks.

My parents leave on Saturday for the Michigander bike trip.  I want to go but I need to work.  So I get the house to myself for a week,  Party time!  But not really because my mom and sister may be reading this,  ::waves to family members::

I think thats about it, or all that I can think of right now.
Till next time I'm Chris Carvell stay classy San Diego
hey look at my new icon.  I am very bored so Im going to go play video games.

Hello live journal how've you been.  

Good news on the work end of my life.  I sat down with "Chef" the other day and I will be, hopefully soon, doing more skillful sous chef like work with more hours.  

More hours, good?  Yes very more hours = qualify for health insurance
also more hours = more money = move out sooner = yay

If you havent noticed I am ready to move out.  I love my parents dearly but having never gone away to college I am ready to get away for a while.  I just need to find a cheap place and roomates.

thats enough late night rambling for me tonight.

so we meet again live journal.   

Wow I avent updated in a while.  Where to begin?  Well first I just turned the big 20 on friday.  I then proceeded to celebrate with a nice long day of work.

working backwards, work is starting to look up.  I have been "promoted" from hot apps to roasted meats, this got me a wopping 50 cent raise.  Look out Bill gates Im cathing up.  In other work news almont the entire staff may be turned over.  For the past four days the manager has had meetings with the owners, and they are not happy with the job the head chef and both sous chefs are doing.  I can only hope that in the future my skills can be used to thier full potential, aka sous chef.  Also we may lose most of our mexicans due to legalities.

that was quite a rant for me.  Anyways I also got my lip pierced hopfully a picture will be coming shortly

Im out of school for a long time.  And I dont just mean the summer, I mean Im done forever unless I take a few classes here and there or completely change what I am doing.  

Anyways work is starting to suc, hopefully that will "cure" itself

mmmm update

so lets see,  I just saw punisher today.  I liked it, very comic bookish as it should be.  I still need to see kill bill 2.  Thats next on my list.

Work is starting to slow down whice is kind of good.  Less stress on me.  I will also be moving to the roasted meats station soon.  Hopefully with that will come more money as well as free health insurance.

My back is incredibly sore for saturday nights LQ lock-in.  There were a lot of good players there so I felt the need to play harder.  Good for the score, bad for the body.

Well due to the dorkiness of that last paragraph I am going to go now

I dont know if ive become more of a dork or what but i am updating from Kats Computer in the middle of Java Hutt.

I just got back some awesome B&W pics that I took sunday.  I am sure some of hem will make it in a post soon.  I also get to have some Photoshop fun with them.

Lessee what else,  If i can find the materials (industrial grid steel) I am going to try to make a new computer case for myself.

ummmm i think thats it for now back to the caffeine

You are glucose. People feed off of you. You are
sweet, caring, and a source of energy for
everyone around you. You can inspire others
with your creativity and depth, and you can
keep people alive when in times of famine.
People love you...or at least the way you
taste.

Which Biological Molecule Are You?
brought to you by Quizilla sweet.

So I was excessively bored in nutrition class today as my teacher read the book to us, so my mind wandered over to computer stuff (yeah I know im a nerd).  
For high end gaming systems and servers there are tons of fans and air flow and sometimes even water cooling.  Why not refrigeration?  I think as a fun experiment I will butcher a computer case and a minifridge and go all frankenstein on them and see what turns out.  I could be on a major break through or a major flop who knows.

hello journal,

wow what a weekend.  Friday was crazy busy at work not to mention school before that,  Then staurday was the busiest day in BooCoo history.  No seriously it was.  But today I got to relax.  just went to church and saw Hellboy with Kat. 

Now to start another exciting week of school.   Just 4 weeks left.

Who will you be stuck with at end of time? by chi_a_baidh

this proves to be interesting.

Which Colossal Death Robot Are You?
Brought to you by Rum and Monkey taking a break from business reasearch decided to find out what Colossal Death Robot I was.
i just loaded up photoshop 7.0 and I made a fun icon woo hoo. just thought youd like to see

a very slow day at work, which was nice for a change.  we only had 18 resevations and almost no walk-ins.  

Big stuff happening, at least in my head, but hopefully in real life soon.  
I am thinking about starting an actual small business.  I really want to get more into the computer building thing but I need better advertising.  To get real advertising you have to be a "real" business so Yeah hopefully a business license will be in my future.

thats all for now

so yeah this is my first entry.  oh where to begin.  Well its very late I got off of work at 12:30 where we did 425 covers.  425 covers? I don't get it.  Well that just means we fed 425 people.  That a lot, our max capacity is only 197 at a time.

Enough of work, what else is going on,  Later today (sunday at noon) I am going to a memorial service for my great aunt who just died.  Its not too sad because it was expected.  she was 92 and she went very peacefully.

On a happier note I don't work tomorrow so I think after I do the funeral thing I will go climbing.  I haven't gone in a while which is kinda bad.  If not climbing then I will go for a bike ride.  Have to start training for the michigander.

Well thats enough for today.
